external_games.name: Family Guy DVD Blast! The Freakin' Sweet Trivia Game

name: Family Guy DVD Blast! The Freakin' Sweet Trivia Game
summary:
Scenes from the show! Think you know the Griffin family too well? Great for fans!

The show parenting groups love to hate is finally here with its very own DVD game! Loaded with real show clips, trivia questions, and visual puzzles from the best shows of the first four seasons: Chitty Chitty Death Bang, Emission Impossible and a whole lot more. Game includes dvd, hundreds of Family Guy scenes, stars, characters, images, and trivia challenges.

Fast Paced Trivia Challenge! The TV show parenting groups love to hate is finally here with its very own DVD game! Get your party started with real show clips, trivia questions and visual puzzles from the best shows of the first four seasons of the Family Guy: Chitty Chitty Death Bang, E. Peterbus Unum, Emission Impossible and a whole lot more.
